trans-unit.source: Defines a method that enables controls to obtain client-side script options.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法，以允許控制項取得用戶端指令碼選項。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer> interface enable buttons to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that is used to create the correct postback event reference.
trans-unit.target: 類別可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer>介面啟用按鈕，以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>用來建立正確的回傳事件參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about postback processing, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3).
trans-unit.target: 如需回傳處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。

trans-unit.source: Controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer> interface should also implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface to handle events raised by contained buttons.
trans-unit.target: 控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer>也應該實作介面<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面，以處理內含的按鈕所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The control generating the postback event.
trans-unit.target: 產生回傳事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the options required for a postback script for a specified button control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之按鈕控制項回傳指令碼的必要選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> object containing the options required to generate a postback script for <paramref name="buttonControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> 物件，包含產生 <paramref name="buttonControl" /> 之回傳指令碼的必要選項。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer.GetPostBackOptions%2A> method should configure a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> instance with the information required for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> method to construct a valid postback event reference, which, when executed on the client, initiates a postback.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer.GetPostBackOptions%2A>方法應該設定新<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>的執行個體所需的資訊與<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>方法來建構有效的回傳事件的參考，當用戶端上執行，會起始回傳。
